Text: Dude! Epic! Loved it. Never heard of it but now cant wait for more.

Hopefully it will continue to get scanned. Still waiting on some Image scans, if we ever see them.
The Vault #2 specially, which was published August...

That is the problem with the lesser known comics from the more independent lines. Like my Kill Shakespeare torrent I had issue 1-11 (of 12) forever, and 12 had been out for months but no one scanned it. Im still waiting for a few issues to finish up some other torrents...
